Dialogue: What the fuck?! These people are crazy!
I wandered into a damn cult! They wanted me to do a ritual but they left out the part where the ritual requires them to tear out my damn eyes!
They seemed so enlightened. I was wondering how they saw differently. What was I thinking? I thought they just practiced meditation, hell even yoga!
Nope. Just rip your eyes out! They want to abandon this world and let the darkness swallow everything. Let this world die and bring in the next one, huh? What a bunch of morons.
Not sure how long I can hide here. May only be a matter of time before they come.
